Module it.polimi.ingsw.am01
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am01.eventemitter

Interface EventEmitter<E extends Event>

Type Parameters:
E - the type of events that is emitted by this EventEmitter.
All Known Subinterfaces:
Terminal
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseTuiView, ChatManager, EventEmitterImpl, FaceUpCard, Game, GameManager, GUIView, Keyboard, LinuxTerminal, TuiView, View, WindowsTerminal
public interface EventEmitter<E extends Event>
An object that emits events.

The events that are can be listened to by EventListeners. Before an event listener can receive an event it must be registered using onAny(EventListener) or on(Class, EventListener). The same EventListener can be registered more than once. When an event is emitted EventListeners receive it in the same that they were registered, if a listener is registered multiple times, it will receive the event multiple times.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    EventEmitter.Registration
    A registration is returned by onAny(EventListener) and on(Class, EventListener) and can be used to stop listening to events.

      Registers an EventListener that will listen to any event that is emitted.
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be registered.
      Returns:
      a EventEmitter.Registration that can later be used to unregister this EventListener
      See Also:

    • on

      <T extends E> EventEmitter.Registration on(Class<T> eventClass, EventListener<T> listener)
      Registers an EventListener that will listen only to a certain type of events.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of events that the listener will listen to.
      Parameters:
      eventClass - the listener will be called only if the emitted event is an instance of this class.
      listener - the listener to be registered.
      Returns:
      a EventEmitter.Registration that can later be used to unregister this EventListener
      See Also:
      • unregister(Registration)

    • unregister

      boolean unregister(EventEmitter.Registration registration)
      Remove a registration from this EventEmitter.
      Parameters:
      registration - the registration to remove.
      Returns:
      true iff the provided registration was present and has been removed.
